name: ctStatusSetter
description: Use this task to change the status and status reason of records in the target instance
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown: This task runs through each item in the list (specified by FetchXml, View name, or Regex, and updates the status and stauscode to the values you specify.

inputs.name: targetOrg
inputs.label: Target Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the target organisation where the records status and status reason will be changed. Ensure you use the 'RequireNewInstance' parameter!

inputs.name: recordSelectionType
inputs.label: Record Selection Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: How you want the task to identify the list of Records to work with

inputs.name: recordSelectionCriteria
inputs.label: Record Selection Criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the FetchXML query, View name or Regex to match the list of records you want the task to work with.

inputs.name: entityName
inputs.label: Entity Schema Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unless you chose FetchXml above, you need to specify the name of the entity that should be searched for matching views/records

inputs.name: statecode
inputs.label: Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can specify either the text label on the Status (statecode) or the value (all numerical values will be assumed as the latter, unless they match a label)

inputs.name: statuscode
inputs.label: Status Reason
inputs.helpMarkDown: The text label on the Status Reason (statuscode) or the value (all numerical values will be assumed as the latter, unless they match a label)
